item.title: How to use Jenkins sharedLibrary
item.description: At early stage if we use Jenkins for deployment, each code repository often needed to contain a Jenkinsfile, which defined a large amount of repetitive pipeline code. However, by extracting this repetitive code, we can form a common module, known as the Jenkins Shared Library. The term “Jenkins Shared Library” can be confusing at first glance. For easier understanding, it can be simply considered as a public module, similar to
